plan_analysis:
This forecast hinges on whether the Google Trends daily value for “reza pahlavi” (US, fixed range 2026-02-09 to 2026-03-11) moves by >3 points between  03-02 and 03-11 UTC.  
What we already know:  
• Current value on 2026-03-01 is 100 (peak for last 30 days).  
Gaps a forecaster still needs to fill:  
1. Base-rate / volatility: How often do daily changes for this term exceed 3 points? Knowing the historical distribution of single-day swings in the last 1–2 years gives probabilistic grounding for “Doesn’t change” vs the two directional options.  
2. Resolution mechanics & current benchmark: Exact daily value for 03-02 once the new day is recorded, and the locked scaling URL.  
3. Key drivers: What typically creates spikes or drops in interest for Reza Pahlavi (e.g., protests in Iran, regime news, interviews, US press appearances)?  
4. Current state / upcoming catalysts between now and 03-11: Any scheduled speeches, anniversaries (1979 revolution events, Nowruz prep), media appearances, or breaking Iran news that could move search interest.  
5. Contrarian check: Evidence of an imminent lull or of saturation after a recent peak which might make a >3-point fall more likely.

queries_planned.query: reza pahlavi google trends 2024 daily changes
queries_planned.intent: find charts or analyses showing past day-to-day volatility for the term during 2024.
identify historical events that drove large positive swings, to understand drivers’ magnitude.
see if early-March anniversaries or yearly events reliably move interest.
build a catalogue of past media coverage peaks to compare with current situation.

queries_planned.query: Evaluate daily Google Trends US timeseries for "reza pahlavi" Jan 2024–Feb 2026; compute frequency of >3-point day-to-day moves and summary statistics.
queries_planned.intent: quantify base rate of increases/decreases beyond the resolution threshold.
detect any announced appearances or events between 03-02 and 03-11.
catch breaking or planned events in Iran that could spike searches for Pahlavi.

queries_planned.query: Reza Pahlavi interview or coverage early March 2026 US media, Iranian diaspora
queries_planned.intent: broad semantic sweep for fresh or upcoming content that could drive search interest.
